name: Go Cart Horse Racing Pro
description:
A brand new and unique virtual horse cart racing adventure is here for you. This Horse cart racing 3d simulator game brings you a fun racing horse adventure. In this jungle land the horse cart races have a special place. You are a rider of horse with cart and target is simple finish end line first.


FEATURES:
* Stunningly beautiful jungle 3d environment
* New retro style racing simulator graphics.
* A furious horse racing cart 3D game.
* Ride Super Horse Carts
* An Ultimate racing horse simulator
* Smooth and realistic control.
* Elegant sound effect.
* Thrilling Ride.
* Realistic riding experience.
